scripts.database:migrate: cd backend/database && docker-compose run --rm flyway migrate || echo 'Migration failed, continuing...'
scripts.database:with-migration: npm run database && npm run database:migrate
scripts.database:reset: cd backend/database && docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d --build && sleep 15 && npm run database:migrate
scripts.api: cd backend/api && npm i && node handsUp.js
scripts.ui: cd frontend && npm i && npm start
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run database:with-migration" "npm run api" "npm run ui"
scripts.start:no-migration: concurrently "npm run database" "npm run api" "npm run ui"
scripts.services: concurrently "npm run database" "npm run api" "npm run ui"
scripts.services:with-migration: concurrently "npm run database:with-migration" "npm run api" "npm run ui"
scripts.integration: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run services" "npm run cypress:run:delayed"
scripts.test:integration: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run services" "npm run cypress:run:delayed"
scripts.integration:with-migration: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run services:with-migration" "npm run cypress:run:delayed"
scripts.integration:verbose: concurrently --kill-others --success first --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run database" "npm run api" "npm run ui" "npm run cypress:run:delayed"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run database:reset && npm run start:no-migration
